text:
𝗗𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗴𝗲𝘁 𝘄𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗱???

Read many newsletters but forget useful info? 

Create quick prompts from the content to avoid re-reading. 

Saves time and keeps key points handy.

Thoughts???
